SongLyrics.JpnStr: 言[こと]葉[ば]のナイフが僕[ぼく]に突[つ]き刺[さ]さった
SongLyrics.EngStr: A knife made of words pierced me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 赤[あか]い血[ち]は流[なが]れはしないが
SongLyrics.EngStr: No red blood flows

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 消[き]えない傷[きず]が僕[ぼく]に囁[ささや]いて
SongLyrics.EngStr: An indelible wound whispers to me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]の心[こころ]の片隅[かたすみ]に住[す]み着[つ]いた
SongLyrics.EngStr: It settled in a corner of my heart

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 言[こと]葉[ば]のナイフが僕[ぼく]に突[つ]き刺[さ]さった
SongLyrics.EngStr: A knife made of words pierced me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 赤[あか]い血[ち]は流[なが]れはしないが
SongLyrics.EngStr: No red blood flows

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうでもいいな全部[ぜんぶ]面倒[めんどう]くさいな
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't care, everything is a hassle

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 布団[ふとん]に潜[もぐ]って目[め]を閉[と]じる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I dive into the futon and close my eyes

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 死[し]んでしまえたらどんなに楽[らく]になるんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How easy would it be if I could die

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 手放[てばな]してしまえばどんなに笑[わら]えるだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How much could I laugh if I let go

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 息[いき]をすることが怖[こわ]くて眠[ねむ]れなくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm afraid to breathe and can't sleep

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 真[ま]っ暗[くら]な部屋[へや]で 朝[あさ]を待[ま]つ 朝[あさ]を待[ま]つ
SongLyrics.EngStr: In a pitch-dark room, I wait for the morning, I wait for the morning

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 目[め]が覚[さ]めてもすぐに動[うご]けなくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I wake up, I can't move right away

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嗚呼[ああ]今日[きょう]が来[き]てしまった
SongLyrics.EngStr: Ah, today has come

SongLyrics.JpnStr: このまま時間[じかん]が止[と]まってしまえばと
SongLyrics.EngStr: If only time could stop like this

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 午前[ごぜん]7時[じ]に思[おも]うこと 思[おも]うこと
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's what I think at 7 AM

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 人[ひと]は簡[かん]単[たん]に枯[か]れてしまう
SongLyrics.EngStr: People wither easily

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 人[ひと]は簡[かん]単[たん]に壊[こわ]れてしまう
SongLyrics.EngStr: People break easily

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 人[ひと]は簡[かん]単[たん]に腐[くさ]ってしまう
SongLyrics.EngStr: People rot easily

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 人[ひと]は簡[かん]単[たん]に殺[ころ]せてしまう
SongLyrics.EngStr: People can be easily killed

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 死[し]んでしまえたらどんなに楽[らく]になるんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How easy would it be if I could die

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 手放[てばな]してしまえばどんなに笑[わら]えるだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How much could I laugh if I let go

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 息[いき]をすることが怖[こわ]くて一[ひと]人[り]で居[い]たくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm afraid to breathe and want to be alone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 扉[とびら]を開[あ]けれずに 立[た]ちすくむ 立[た]ちすくむ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Unable to open the door, I stand still, I stand still

ListVocab: どうでもいい-どうでもいい
